executable.title: ODF fib Convert
executable.description: Conversion ITK/fib. Give either an ODF image in itk format or fib format, if both are given the conversion ITK to fib will be done. The ODF itk image must be a vector image containing the 15 spherical harmonics coefficients for each voxel.

image.name: ODFitk
image.description: ODF image in itk format (.nrrd, .nii, .nii.gz). A mask and a FA image are required to convert ITK image to fib file.
image.label: ODF itk Image

image.name: mask
image.description: Mask image to apply to the ODF in itk format (.nrrd, .nii, .nii.gz)
image.label: Mask Image

image.name: outputODF
image.description: Output ODF image in ITK or fib format
image.label: Output ODF image
